definition: to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control
lit. to have one's hands bound and be unable to do anything about it (idiom); fig. helpless in the face of a crisis
free and unconstrained (idiom); unfettered/unbuttoned/without care or worries
hands tied and waiting to be captured
tied up in a bundle on a high shelf/to put sth on the back burner/no longer a high priority

sentences.english: The effects of the optical beam width and cladding on imaging are analysed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了光束束宽和包层对成像的影响。

sentences.english: Each piece had a gold rim and a band of roses.
sentences.chinese: 每一件都绘有金边和玫瑰花束。

sentences.english: But the parallel-beam can not be realized directly in engineering.
sentences.chinese: 平行束投影在工程上是不能直接实现的。

sentences.english: In particular he sought the canonical form of any pencil.
sentences.chinese: 他特别地找寻任何束的标准型。

sentences.english: The paper studies the principle of homochromous beam grating scanning.
sentences.chinese: 着重分析了单色光束的光栅扫描理论。

sentences.chinese: 用于对亚麻短纤维束进行加捻。

sentences.english: The bundle sticking out on the right are the optical tracts, leading to the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 右边伸出的一束是视觉传导束，它通向眼睛。

sentences.chinese: 两束远轴面隔膜束进入两枚内轮雄蕊。

sentences.english: By applying "slit method", the beam width of THz wave was measured.
sentences.chinese: 利用“狭缝法“测量了太赫兹光束的束宽。

sentences.english: To narrow the molecular beam (water group), adjusting the molecular structure of volatility.
sentences.chinese: 缩小分子束水分子集团，调整分子结构波动。

sentences.english: Its characteristic parameters have been deduced from the measured data.
sentences.chinese: 用测量数据得到了笔形束模型的特征参数。

sentences.chinese: 一个个年轻男女欢欣鼓舞，一束束鲜艳玫瑰跃跃欲试。

sentences.english: A steel bar bundle can be arranged and anchored once via the clamping sheet.
sentences.chinese: 所以它能将钢筋束一次安装穿束和锚固。

sentences.english: Because of her findings, the movent to end the powerful monopolies was greatly sengthened.
sentences.chinese: 由于她的发现，大大加强告终束独有垄断运动的权势。

sentences.chinese: 每根钢索的单股钢丝束悬挂在滑车组上。

definition: crowded/framework for silkworms/gather foliage/bunch/classifier for bunched objects
strand/thread/detailed/in detail/classifier for wisps (of smoke, mist or vapor), strands, locks (of hair)
flower/earlobe/fig. item on both sides/classifier for flowers, clouds etc
